name: Fast Link Shorten Plugin
author: GÃ¶khan KARA

sections.description:
This plugin is a waste of time for the sole purpose of quickly instantly a link of your choice, without having to bc.vc link to turn works. Activate the plugin and you can use in 3 stages in a way unlimited. After defining the system, your user ID and API key, you only need to use a short code of the process.

After activating the plugin settings from the menu on the left in order to receive information about the use / fast, just click on shorten link

For a successful usage, please complete all of the following stages carry out in a manner that when the transaction is complete and check again.Globally, the use of English and Turkish the plugin is suitable.

Support

Suppport : http://www.gokhankara.net/contact or gkdesigned@gmail.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/fast-link-shorten’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Fast Link Shorten screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
  5. Plugin setup, settings video tutorial : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DcPNfGDrFD4
  6. Docs : http://blog.gokhankara.net/wordpress-icin-bc-vc-hizli-link-kisaltma-eklentisi
sections.faq:
There is a panel usage and settings ?

Yes. You can examine and use the settings from the panel. URL : /wp-admin/options-general.php?page=fastlinkshorten

The API system for which the information is required ?

Bc.it is enough to be a member of the VC site.
